Welcome to the TEST Server!
Rates: x10 (Retail)
FREE items in the Town of Giran.
Boss respawn times: Epic 1 hour, Simple 1-2 minutes.
Player Commands: .menu .shop .buff .gk .market .votereward .sub
.setlvl .class .boss .bank .sellbuffs .cancelsellbuffs .dressme
Please report any bugs/mistakes on the l2jbrasil forum. Thank you!
